name: Eye am a Dragon
description:
You are a dragon!

Defend yourself from those insignificant humans by looking at them (with an eye tracking device)... and roar like a dragon to throw out fire upon them!

A game by Francesco Laddomada, Mira Dorthè and Dario Pruneti made for the Alt Ctrl Game Jam 2015

Complete gameplay example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RyWLQ5LA29Y

Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DhN37cCYToY
